info:
# Redirection des donnnées
## Message entrant sur le port série
 - On vérifie si les données commence par @
 - Si non , on rejette le messge.
 - Si oui, on extrait le topic pour l'envoyer vers MQTT.

sql:
INSERT INTO SYSTEM_LOG (
    id_device,
    id_event_type,
    log,
    topic,
    counter,
    version,
    datetime
)
VALUES (
  ( SELECT id_device 
    FROM DEVICE 
    WHERE DEVICE.mac LIKE $mac ),
  ( SELECT id_event_type
    FROM EVENT_TYPE
    WHERE event_type LIKE $event_type),
  $log,
  $topic,
  $counter,
  $version,
  datetime('now', 'localtime')
);
name: SystemLog
GatewayLog
To MQTT
To serial port
func:
msg.payload = "@" + msg.topic + ":" + msg.payload;

return msg;

Load devices
Éditeur device
format:
<template>
  <v-layout class="rounded rounded-md">
    <v-app-bar color="surface-variant" title="Configuration Device">
      <v-btn append-icon="mdi-send-circle" position="static" text="Send to device" variant="outlined" color="primary"
        @click="sendToDevice()"></v-btn>
      <v-btn append-icon="mdi-refresh" position="static" text="Refresh" variant="outlined" color="primary"
        @click="refreshBD()"></v-btn>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-navigation-drawer location="left" border="1" width="350">
      <v-card class="mx-auto pa-1" min-height="500">
        <v-list bg-color="grey-lighten-2" max-width="350">
          <v-list-subheader>Devices</v-list-subheader>
          <v-list-item v-for="(item, i) in devices" :key="item.id_device" color="primary" rounded="xl"
            @click="device = item">
            {{ item.mac }} - {{ item.location }}
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-card>

    </v-navigation-drawer>

    <v-main >
      <!-- ========================================================================= -->
      <!-- Device -->
      <v-card min-height="500">
        <v-container class="bg-blue-grey-darken-1 pa-5 ma-1">
          <v-card class="text-Left pa-1 text-caption" color="blue-grey-lighten-2" title="Device">
            <v-card-text>
              {{ device.id_device }} - {{ device.mac }}</v-card-text>
          </v-card>
          <v-row>
            <v-col cols="3">
              <v-text-field v-model="device.location" label="Location" required density="compact"></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="2">
              <v-text-field v-model="device.sleep_duration" label="Sleep" type="number" hide-details required
                density="compact" />
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="2">
              <v-text-field v-model="device.im_alive_period" label="ImAlive" type="number" hide-details required
                density="compact">
              </v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="1">
              <v-icon small @click="saveDevice()" icon="mdi:mdi-content-save" :disabled="deviceChange" />
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-container>
        <!-- ========================================================================= -->
        <!-- Sensors -->
        <v-card class="pa-2 ma-1 text-h12" color="blue-grey-lighten-2" max-width="600">
          <v-row>
            <v-col cols="2"> Sensors</v-col>
            <v-col cols="3">
              <v-icon small @click="addSensor()"> mdi-plus-circle </v-icon>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-card>
        <v-container class="bg-blue-grey-darken-1 mb-1 ma-1" v-for="(sensor, index) in device.sensors"
          :key="sensor.id_sensor">
          <v-row>
            <v-col cols="1" offset="1" align-self="start">
              <v-text-field :model-value="sensor.id_sensor" hide-details disabled density="compact"
                bg-color="bg-blue-grey-darken-2"></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="3">
              <v-select v-model="sensor.sensor_role" :items="rolesList" label="Rôle" return-object single-line density="compact">
              </v-select>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="2">
              <v-icon small @click="deleteSensor(sensor, index)" icon="mdi:mdi-delete"></v-icon>
              <v-icon small @click="saveSensor(device, sensor)" icon="mdi:mdi-content-save"></v-icon>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>

          <!-- ================================== Attributs ======================================= -->
          <!-- En tête -->
          <v-card class="pa-2 ma-1 text-h12" color="blue-grey-lighten-2">
            <v-row>
              <v-col cols="2"> Attributs</v-col>
              <v-col cols="3">
                <v-icon small @click="addAttribut(sensor)" icon="mdi:mdi-plus-circle" />
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          </v-card>
          <!-- Attributs -- Liste des attributs -->
          <v-container class="bg-blue-grey-darken-1 mb-0" v-for="(attribut, attIndex) in sensor.attributs">
            <v-row>
              <v-col cols="1" offset="1" align-self="start">
                <v-text-field :model-value="attribut.id_attribut" hide-details disabled density="compact"
                  bg-color="bg-blue-grey-darken-2"></v-text-field>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="3">
                <v-text-field v-model="attribut.name" label="Nom" hide-details required density="compact">
                </v-text-field>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="3">
                <v-text-field v-model="attribut.value" label="Valeur" hide-details required density="compact">
                </v-text-field>
              </v-col>
              <!-- Attributs -- Liste des actions -->
              <v-col cols="2">
                <v-icon small @click="deleteAttribut(sensor, attribut, attIndex)" icon="mdi:mdi-delete"> </v-icon>
                <v-icon small @click="saveAttribut(sensor, attribut)" icon="mdi:mdi-content-save"></v-icon>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          </v-container>
        </v-container>
      </v-card>
    </v-main>
  </v-layout>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data: () => ({
    devices: [],
    device: {},
    deviceId: -1,
    deviceChange: false,
    attributToUpdate: {},    
    sensorToUpdate: {},
    rolesList: ["ND"],
    
    }),
    mounted() {
      this.devices = this.msg?.devices;
     console.log("mounted");
    },
    updated(){
      this.send({message:"updated"});
    },
    onInput(){
      this.send({message:"onInput"});
    },
    watch: {
      msg: function(){
        switch(this.msg.action){
          case "loadRoles":
            this.rolesList = this.msg.rolesList;
            break;
          case "loadDevices":
            this.devices = this.msg.devices;
            break;
          case  "attributLastId":
             this.attributToUpdate.id_attribut = this.msg.insertId;
            break;
           case  "sensorLastId":
             this.sensorToUpdate.id_sensor = this.msg.insertId;
            break;
         default:
           
        }
        
      }
    },
    methods: {
      refreshBD() {
            this.send({type: "refreshBD"});
      },
      sendToDevice() {
        this.send({type: "configuration",action: "send",device: this.device});
        
      },
      saveDevice() {
        this.send({type: "device",action: "update",device: this.device});
      },
      saveSensor(device, sensor) {
        if(sensor.id_sensor === -1){
          this.sensorToUpdate = sensor;
          this.send({type: "sensor",action:"insert",device: device, sensor: sensor});
        }else{
          this.send({type: "sensor",action:"update",device: device, sensor: sensor});
        }
      },
      saveAttribut(sensor, attribut) {
        this.attributToUpdate = attribut;

        if (attribut.id_attribut == -1) {
          console.log("Ajout attribut à la BD")
          this.send({type: "attribut",action:"insert",id_sensor: sensor.id_sensor, attribut: attribut});
        }else{
          this.send({type:"attribut", action:"update", attribut: attribut});
        }
      },
      updateSensor(index) {
        //Ne fait rien
      },
      addSensor() {
        this.device.sensors.push({
          id_sensor: -1,
          attributs: [],
        })
      },
      
      addAttribut(sensor) {
        sensor.attributs.push({
          id_attribut: -1,
          name: 'XXX',
          value: 0
        });
        console.log('test')
      },
      deleteSensor(sensor, index) {
        let x = this.device.sensors.splice(index, 1)
        this.send({type: "sensor",action:"delete",sensor:sensor});
      },
      deleteAttribut(sensor, attribut, attIndex) {
        let x = sensor.attributs.splice(attIndex, 1);
        this.send({type: "attribut", action: "delete", attribut: attribut});
      },
    },
  }
</script>

name: Device params

sql:
UPDATE DEVICE 
SET location  = $location,
  sleep_duration = $sleep_duration,
  im_alive_period = $im_alive_period,
  datetime = strftime('%s','now')
WHERE id_device = $id_device;

sql:
INSERT INTO SENSOR_ATTRIBUT (
    id_sensor,
    name,
    value)
VALUES (
    $id_sensor,
    $name,
    $value);
name: Insert

sql:
UPDATE SENSOR_ATTRIBUT
SET name = $name,
    value = $value
WHERE id_attribut = $id_attribut;
name: Update
Sensor params

sql:
UPDATE SENSOR
SET id_role = 
    (SELECT id_role 
     FROM SENSOR_ROLE
     where role like $sensor_role)
 WHERE id_sensor = $id_sensor;
name: Update

sql:
INSERT INTO SENSOR (
    id_device,
    id_role)
VALUES( 
    $id_device,
    (   SELECT id_role 
        FROM SENSOR_ROLE
        where role like $sensor_role)
);
name: Insert

sql:
SELECT id_sensor, mac, counter,  max(datetime ) as datetime
FROM DATA_VIEW
where  datetime > datetime('now', 'localtime', '-24 hours')
group by id_sensor
order by id_sensor, datetime ;
name: Most recent data temperature

Params

sql:
SELECT mac, id_sensor, 
temperature, humidity, counter, datetime
from DATA_VIEW
where id_device in ( $ids_devices)
and datetime > datetime('now', 'localtime', $nbHours )
and role like 'TEMPERATURE'
ORDER BY id_sensor, datetime asc;
name: Load temp sensor

Slider
format:
<template>
  <v-slider v-model="slider" :max="max" :min="min" step="1" v-on:end="onEnd" class="align-center" hide-details
    thumb-label="always" tick-size=1>
  </v-slider>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data () {
      return {
        min: 4,
        max: 360,
        step: 0,
        slider: 24,
      }
    },
    watch: {
     
      msg: function(){
        this.send({action: "msg", slider: this.slider});
        
      }
    },
    mounted() {
      //this.send({payload: this.slider})
    },
   methods: {
      onEnd() {
        this.send({action: "onEnd()",slider: this.slider})
      },
    },
  }
</script>

name: Charts data

sql:
SELECT 'SiteWeb' as location, temperature, humidity, datetime
FROM TEMPERATURE_EXTERNE
where  datetime > datetime('now', 'localtime', $nbHours)
order by datetime asc;
name: Load temp WEB

sql:
SELECT DE.id_device,
       DE.mac,
       DE.location,
       SE.id_sensor
  FROM DEVICE DE
       JOIN
       SENSOR SE ON SE.id_device == DE.id_device
 WHERE EXISTS (
           SELECT 1
             FROM SENSOR_TEMPERATURE
            WHERE id_sensor = SE.id_sensor
       );
name: Load devices
Params
Data des températures externes d'un site web

sql:
DELETE FROM SENSOR_TEMPERATURE_BK
 where  datetime < datetime('now', 'localtime', '-60 days');
name: Purge BK

sql:
INSERT INTO SENSOR_TEMPERATURE_BK 
    SELECT *
    FROM SENSOR_TEMPERATURE
    WHERE id_sensor_data > 
        (SELECT CASE WHEN max(id_sensor_data) 
            IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE max(id_sensor_data) END
        FROM SENSOR_TEMPERATURE_BK);
name: Copy data to BK

sql:
INSERT INTO TEMPERATURE_EXTERNE_BK 
    SELECT *
    FROM TEMPERATURE_EXTERNE
    -- Récupération des données dont le ID > MaxId du backup
    WHERE id_temp_externe > 
        (SELECT CASE WHEN max(id_temp_externe) 
            IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE max(id_temp_externe) END
        FROM TEMPERATURE_EXTERNE_BK);
name: Copy data to BK

name: TEST Alert
format:
<template>
    <!-- Any HTML can go here -->
    <button class="my-class" onclick="onClick1()">My Button</button>
</template>

<script>
   // export default {
  //  data: () => ({
      
     
  //  }),
      /* Write any JavaScript here */
    // add our onClick function to the window object to make it accessible by the HTML <button>
    window.onClick1 = function () {
        alert('Button has been clicked')
    }

    // Use send() function to pass on data back into Node-RED:
    this.send('Component has loaded')

    // Subscribe to the incoming msg's
    this.$socket.on('msg-input:' + this.id, function(msg) {
        // do stuff with the message
        alert('BT1 message received: ' + msg.payload)
    })
 //   }
</script>
